Title: Shampoo for sensible hairs (SMOOTH)
Description:
Delicacy, harmony and balance in its purest form - that's Smooth. Great hair is all about balance, but it all starts with a healthy scalp. Smooth is a shampoo for sensitive scalps with soothing, antioxidant and antiseptic active ingredients that reduce itchiness, dryness and irritation. Its delicate formula works by gently cleansing and soothing active irritation processes. It is specially designed for scalps prone to flaking.

 

Its plant-based technologies based on soothing oils, calendula, burdock, camomile and xylitol harmonise the hair microbiota. Its use is designed to treat both dry dandruff and oily dandruff. In addition, its formula is indicated in cases of mild dermatitis, such as hair irritations.


100 grams | Sulfate, silicone and paraben free shampoo | Suitable for pregnant women | Suitable for scalps with atopic dermatitis | Cruelty free and vegan | 100% natural ingredients | 100% natural ingredients
Tags: Natural, organic

Title: Organic Bug Spray Bug Repellant
Description:
This completely natural bug spray is perfect for those nighttime hikes in mosquito season. Made with a base of Organic Witch Hazel and essential oils, this light mist is great for kids and adults alike. This The Citronella oil keeps mosquitoes and black flies away, the organic Lavender oil keeps away black flies and head lice and the Sweet Orange oil keeps away fleas. You'll be covered from all those nasty !

Shake well before use. Spray as needed on exposed areas to keep away mosquitoes, black flies, fleas, ticks, and lice. Avoid spraying directly on the face. Use as needed. Bug Off! is all-natural and safe for the whole family. Deet and chemical-free to protect you and your family naturally!

Not recommended for children under 2.

Ingredients: Witch Hazel*, Citronella Oil*, Lavender Oil*, Sweet Orange Oil*
*Indicates Certified Organic

Description:
Cold & Flu Relief. Immune Support. Allergy Relief. Made with only certified organic ingredients.

Fresh | Pure | Organic Freshly made in small batches!

For boosting your immune system & prevention, enjoy 1 tbs. every single dayÑthis is the best form of self-care!

If you feel the onset of cold/flu or your allergies are acting up, up the dose to 3-4 tbs. a day.

Only real, highest-quality, certified organic ingredients.

It doesn't get healthier than this.

Freshness alert! Refrigerate & enjoy within 6 months.

Title: Portable Electric Hot Wax Melting Machine for Hair Removal
Description:
Descriptions:

  • A wax hair remover machine is used for hair removal nursing, beauty care, and skin care.

  • Waxing melting uses durable heat-assisted material to prevent overheating more durable than many machines on the market. Capable of heating hard wax, canned wax, wax beads, Brazilian wax, and wax blocks. The wax warmer kit is body safe and can be used for the face, eyebrow, nose, lip, cheek, arms, armpit, chest, leg, hands, legs, bikini line, and private area.

  • This economical wax melter is the best gift in summer and can be given to family and friends to remove their unnecessary hair.

Features:  

    [Easy Operation]

    Put the wax beads into the wax machine, and heat the wax to the flow state, using a spatula to stir the wax. Just heat the wax in the pot for 10 minutes and use the wooden applicator to apply.

    Wax hardens by itself and you simply pull it off smoothly, without applying strips on top, for total body depilatory needs.

    [Nursing Your Body Skin]

    Used for hair removal nursing, beauty care, and skin care.

    [Multipurpose]

    Fits any type of wax including wax beads, hard wax, soft wax, 14-ounce wax cans, loose wax, bricks bikini wax, microwavable wax, and hair wax. A DIY beauty lover also can wax at home. Also can be used by women and men.

    [Durable and Light]

    With high quality and high-temperature materials, electric cable, and plug, This wax kit for hair removal is very durable and light. it is irreplaceable for any waxing needs.

    [Easy Operation]

    You just need a wax heater pot, and wooden chip sticks to apply the wax to the area you want to deal with.


Specifications:

    Color: Black/White

    Size: 19x18x13cm

    Instrument net weight: 620g


Package Includes:

   1*Wax machine 


How To Use:

   1. Choose any hard wax beans of the flavor you like the most to remove your body hair.

   2. Melt the appropriate amount of hard wax beans in a wax warmer.

   3. Melt hard wax at maximum temperature, then tum the heating down to medium and let it cool until it's the consistency of honey. Allow 30 seconds to harden. As soon as the wax isn't sticky to touch, pull the wax quickly in the opposite direction of hair growth.


Notes:

   1. Before applying the skin, make sure that the wax is not too hot.

   2. After the wax has melted, do not heat it at a high temperature to avoid damage to the heater.

   3. Keep away from children.
Tags: economical wax melter, Electric Hot Wax Melting Machine, Hair Removal, wax hair remover machine, wax machine

Title: FINN & GUNNAR NORDIC MASCULINITY MUSTACHE WAX 30 ML
Description:
MASCULINITY BEARD STYLING
Sustainable plant based beard styling products providing effective hold, control and flexibility to beard and moustache while taking care of the hair and skin in a natural and gentle manner.

MOUSTACHE WAX
Norwegian homemade and handmade mustache wax is formulated exclusively on natural sustainable ingredients. The natural waxes provide the required fixation and moulds your moustache into the style you want. Beeswax and shea butter give your personal style while Bilberries, olive, rosemary and sunflower will nourish the moustache. 100% of the ingredients are natural. Vegan. Handmade and homemade in Norway.

Bilberries (Vaccinium myrtillus) are rich in the antioxidant anthocyanin. Works as an effective moisturizer and exfoliant. Its natural astringent properties soothe an inflamed or irritated scalp. The antioxidants ensure that hair growth is stable and consistent.

Finn & Gunnar Nordic Hair Care has their beehives on their property in the heart of Jessheim. From there, the bees collect honey in the local environment, and they thrive well. In addition to pollinating plants where people live, they collect wax that are found in Finn & Gunnar Moustache Wax.

Shea Butter is well known for its great benefits for hair and skin due to its properties for moisturize and is rich in vitamins A, E , F and essential fatty acids. It helps with beard-druff, eczema and dermatitis. Helps agianst hair breakage, has anti-inflammatory qualities and also helps skin against heat and cold.

Sunflower is great for mustache because it helps to prevent breakage and hair loss and is particularly rich in Omega, fatty acids and vitamin A,B,C and E.

All great ingredients that keep the moustache moisturized and soft.
Olive oil is rich in vitamin E and help moisturize dry skin underneath an mustache.
Rosemary is a excellent disinfectant for the skin and moustache and is known for reverse premature graying as well as it is a healthy moisturizer.

Our ingredients are combined to promote beard growth, keep your mustache healthy and always at its best.

Comes with the fresh scent of the Norwegian wood from 100 % natural perfume of bilberry and woods.

Our products are tested on us, not on animals.

For best result, combine with our other Finn & Gunnar Nordic Masculinity products.

Our product boxes are FSC certiﬁed and use eco-friendly paper made by replacing parts of virgin tree pulp with residues of organic products such as by-products from citrus fruits, grapes, cherries, corn, olives, coffee, kiwi fruits, hazelnuts and almonds.

Labels with Ecological certification. We use mineral paper produced without trees, without water, without chlorine, without PVC and zero toxic gas emission. Bottles are made from PCR50% PET, re-using plastic that already has been produced.

Always recycle - We encourage all users of our product to dispose for correct recycling.

Tough On The Outside, Soft On The Inside.
Great hair care for men requires great skin care at the same time.

Style Your Hair With Nordic Care
Based on our legacy from four generations of hair care professionals and with more than 100 years of accumulated experience, FINN & GUNNAR a Nordic brand that is well rooted in the tradition of using organic ingredients that care for your hair effectively, gently and naturally. Our products are handmade in Norway, the recipes are of course free of toxic and harmful substances, but where we highlight the bioactive components found in herbs and plants throughout the Nordic region. By combining Nordic traditions in phytotherapy with modern science in hair care, we have developed an organic and ethical product portfolio that is adapted to the demanding needs for hair care women and men have in the Nordic countries. All our products contain clean water from Norwegian rivers and lakes. We want our customers and dealers to be sure that our products live up to strict requirements with sustainability and quality. The products are manufactured according to standards that ensure the interests of both humans and animals,

Extracting The Best Of Nordic Sea And Soil
Nature in its purest and nurturing form. Inspired by hundreds of years of phytotherapeutic tradition, people in the Nordic countries have learned to harvest and extract the best from soil and sea, with the aim of caring for their loved ones and building a healthy society, as well as ensuring a sustainable ecosystem.

Title: ZERO WASTE | FRENCH GREEN CLAY
Description:
FRENCH GREEN CLAY SHAMPOO BAR




Our range of shampoo bars makes the most of the natural ingredients to nourish and revitalize your hair.

Suitable for all hair types

Why use a shampoo bar?

It's SLS Free (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate).
Shampoo bars offer a low carbon footprint. These solid bars are more lightweight and compact than their bottled counterparts, so they require less space during transport relative to the same amount of washes with liquid shampoo.
They Last A lot Longer in some cases up to 50-75 washes for short hair.

How often should I wash my hair with a shampoo bar?

If you are ready to start using a shampoo bar for the first time, I suggest you apply this after your shampoo every 2/3 days until your hair has properly transitioned and got used to the ingredients of your new shampoo. Give it time then use as you would a normal liquid shampoo.

All our shampoo bars will leave your hair feeling clean, revitalized, and healthy, with olive oils, coconut oils, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, And many more Healthy oils & Botanicals embedded in our shampoo bars.

WASHES UP TO 30 -50 | WEIGHT 110G | SUITABILITY FOR ALL HAIR TYPES

French Green Clay
Is reputed to effectively eliminate dirt, product build-up, dandruff, and toxins while balancing oil production to cleanse excessive oils without stripping the natural oils.
Coconut Oil
 reduces inflammation, keeps skin moisturised, helping heal wounds. The medium-chain fatty acids found in coconut oil also possess antimicrobial properties that can help treat acne and protect the skin from harmful bacteria.
Flaxseed Oil
 Vitamin E in flaxseed oil helps to treat hair loss and stimulate new hair growth. Lignans act as strong antioxidants that can help in the regrowth of healthier and stronger hair And nourish the scalp from within, providing relief from dandruff.

 

Additional Information:
All FS products are formulated to comply with the EU and UK Cosmetics Safety Regulations (EC (No) 1223/2009).

An important part of meeting the Regulations is the requirement to ensure our products are safe for the user.
Any ingredients that are listed as prohibited by law cannot be used.
In addition, it is a requirement of the legislation that all of our products have a valid Cosmetic Product Safety Report.
This is created by a highly qualified Toxicologist and Safety Assessor, who holds a Ph.D. in Toxicology and is a Member of the Royal Society of Biology, and has many years’ experience in the industry.

 

 INGREDIENTS
Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Stearate, Sorbitol, Sodium Laurate, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Titanium Dioxide, Stearic Acid, Lauric Acid, Pentasodium Pentetate, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Polyquaternium-7, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Sodium Benzoate, Cosmetic Grade Green Clay-Illite/Kaolin/Montmorillonite, Linum Usitatissimum Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Fragrance Oil Sparkling Rain And Lotus, No Added Colouring.
Tags: Shampoo Bar

This vapor rub is an olive oil and beeswax base that is healing and nutritive to the skin. The vapor comes from a healing combination of essential oils all known for aiding and relieving sickness. It has eucalyptus and rosemary essential oils that clear sinus passageways and lungs and peppermint that clears the nose and rejuvenates the mind. Here at Butter Me Up Organics we like to say, "Don't put anything on your body that you wouldn't put in it." So, on that note, all of our products are completely edible. They may not be so tasty, however, but everything we use are non- toxic premium ingredients. Can you say that about the products you're currently using? Title: Pro-Ocean Refillable Conditioner Bottle 32 oz
Description:
The MASAMI 32 oz Refillable, Sustainable Bottle was designed to elevate any bathroom and last a lifetime. It comes with a stainless steel pump and a 32 oz recyclable pouch filled with our high-performing luxurious Mekabu Hydrating Conditioner. 
We're committed to furthering our sustainability efforts, so we designed this stunning large-size, black ceramic, refillable bottle to replace our plastic packaging. We hope you join us on our journey to make the beauty industry more sustainable. This refillable bottle is the first of many initiatives to come.
MASAMI Mekabu Hydrating Conditioner is fortified by the hydrating qualities of the Japanese ocean botanical Mekabu, and enhanced with Laminaria Japonica (Kombu) seaweed, aloe vera, blueberry extract, Vitamin B and other powerful anti-oxidants. This deep yet lightweight conditioner nourishes to restore softness, shine and manageability while soothing the scalp.
Benefits:
  • Botanically hydrating
  • Safe for color-treated hair
  • NO parabens, NO sulfates, NO phthalates
  • NO animal testing (cruelty-free)
  • Vegan
  • Gender neutral
Ingredients:  ­Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Dicetyldimonium, Chloride Isopropanol, Stearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Undaria Pinnatifida (Mekabu) Powder, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol (Vitamin B), Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol (our fragrance is naturally derived and phthalate-free).
For best results:
Following MASAMI shampoo, apply conditioner from roots to ends. Leave in hair for 1-3 minutes as needed. Rinse thoroughly.  For continuous hydration, use daily.  Follow with MASAMI Mekabu Hydrating Styling Cream and Shine Serum.

Title: FINN & GUNNAR NORDIC ORGANICS KING BEE WAX 100 ML
Description:
ORGANICS STYLING CARE
A hair styling series based on natural Nordic ingredients providing effective hold, control and flexibility to the hair while taking care of the hair fibres and the scalp.

KING BEE WAX provides extreme hold and a natural look all day long. Beeswax will hold your hair in place under every circumstance and bilberry together with organic glycerine will moisturize the hair naturally.

Its fresh smell of sweet forest berries comes from natural perfume of raspberry, bilberry, passion fruit, and Seaside Mist.

Bilberries (Vaccinium myrtillus) are rich in the antioxidant anthocyanin and works as an effective moisturizer and exfoliant. Its natural astringent properties soothe an inflamed or irritated scalp. The antioxidants ensure that hair growth is stable and consistent.

Finn & Gunnar Nordic Hair Care has their beehives on our property in the heart of Jessheim town in Norway.
From there, the bees collect honey in the local environment, and they thrive well. In addition to pollinating plants where people live, they collect nectar and pollen, which becomes our wax that you will find in Finn & Gunnar products/waxes.

Our products are tested on us, not on animals.

For best result, combine with our other Finn & Gunnar Nordic Organics products.

Our product boxes are FSC certiﬁed and use eco-friendly paper made by replacing parts of virgin tree pulp with residues of organic products such as by-products from citrus fruits, grapes, cherries, corn, olives, coffee, kiwi fruits, hazelnuts and almonds.

Labels with Ecological certification. We use mineral paper produced without trees, without water, without chlorine, without PVC and zero toxic gas emission. Bottles are made from PCR50% PET, re-using plastic that already has been produced.

Always recycle - We encourage all users of our product to dispose for correct recycling.

Style Your Hair With Nordic Care
Based on our legacy of four generations of hair care professionals with more than 100 years of experience, FINN & GUNNAR is a Nordic brand rooted in the tradition of using organic ingredients that care for your hair and scalp in an effective, gentle and natural way. Our products are handmade in Norway, and are formulated to eliminate toxic and harmful substances, while leveraging the bioactive compounds found in herbs and plants across the Nordic region. By combining traditional Nordic phytotherapy traditions with modern hair and skin care science, we have developed an organic and ethical product portfolio adapted to the demanding hair care needs of Nordic men and women. All our products contain pure water from Norwegian rivers and lakes. We are concerned that our customers and retailers will be confident that our products meet stringent requirements for sustainability and quality, and are manufactured acording to standards that safeguard both human and animal interests and the environment as a whole.

Extracting The Best Of Nordic Sea And Soil
Nature in its purest and caring sense. Inspired by hundreds of years of phytotherapy tradition, people in the Nordics have learned to harvest and extract the best of its rich soils and seas, aiming to care for their loved ones, building a healthy community and securing a sustainable ecosystem.

Title: Coconut Silk Conditioning Shampoo Bar
Description:
The newest addition to my shampoo soap line - coconut silk conditioning shampoo bar. An incredible bar with coconut milk, silk and aloe to leave your hair incredibly soft and manageable. This bar is unscented with only the natural scent of the products in it. 

This listing is for 1 bar of soap weighing approximately 5 ounces.


This bar also contains a unique combination of nourishing and softening oils and butters in addition to coconut milk and silk to provide a great conditioning shampoo.


To ensure the long life of your soap, store the bar in a cool place, out of direct sunlight until you’re ready to use it. In your shower, store the bar away from the direct water stream, and out of any standing water.


To get a good lather, swipe the soap bar across your wet hair a few times and lather and scrub. Then rinse.


***************************

Gets your hair squeaky clean -- literally! Quick shipping; thanks!


My favorite shampoo bar from an seller yet! Leaves my hair clean, soft and shiny with no weird residue like others I've tried. Smells great too!

Absolutely divine, your shampoo actually leaves my hair feeling great, the other bar shampoo's I have tried it takes weeks to get used to and leaves my hair rather oily. Love your moisturizer too, the texture and smells are wonderful!

**************************

Title: Rosemary Nettle Shampoo Bar
Description:
This rosemary nettle shampoo bar is all you need for thick gorgeous hair!


Rosemary is queen and king when it comes to hair and scalp care. It is, overall, an excellent tonic for hair and scalp helping to strengthen the hair, stimulating the follicles and combating dry and flaky scalps thus helping to reduce dandruff.


Nettle works gently to stimulate blood circulation to the scalp. It not only oxygenates the hair follicles but also strengthens hair fibers. Nettle promotes hair growth as well as hair health, shine and fullness for any type of hair.


Treat your hair to a handcrafted shampoo bar that not only cleanses, but also nourishes and softens as you lather. Most commercial shampoos contain harsh synthetics that cleanse by stripping your hair of everything, including natural oils. That not only leaves your hair dry and unmanageable, but also dull-looking. This natural shampoo bar is created with hair-loving ingredients, turning an ordinary routine into an indulgent experience, and leaving your hair nourished and naturally beautiful! It can also be used as a bath soap.


The scent is rosemary, tea tree, lavender and cedarwood. A fresh clean scent to clean and moisturize your hair. This is a great bar for all hair types!


This bar also contains a unique combination of nourishing and softening oils and butters. Jojoba oil is a penetrating moisturizer that is similar to our hairs own natural oils, and is rich in protein and minerals. Wheat germ oil is rich in vitamins A, B, E, and D, improving the health of your hair from its root, to its tip. A mix of olive and castor oil attracts moisture to the hair and is rich in vitamins, while cocoa butter and shea butter help to soften and moisturize. Coconut oil works to create an incredible lather, and palm oil ensures a long-lasting bar of soap.


To ensure the long life of your soap, store the bar in a cool place, out of direct sunlight until youre ready to use it. In your shower, store the bar away from the direct water stream, and out of any standing water.


To get a good lather, swipe the soap bar across your wet hair a few times and lather and scrub. Then rinse.


***************************


TESTIMONIALS


LOVE this shampoo bar. I've tried other natural ways of washing my hair but I never can get past the "greasy" hair beginning stages. With this shampoo bar, my hair acted just like I had used my favorite commercial shampoo except this way was natural! Thanks so much


Another awesome purchase, I have very thin, baby fine hair and I believe my hair looks and feels thicker and healthier after even the first wash. and you definitely don't need conditioner after using this which is a big plus for baby fine hair like mine.


This is the first time using a shampoo bar and I'm pretty impressed. This scent is sooo amazing and my hair feels so much thicker after using this. Awesome seller. Quick shipping and great communication! Wonderful products :)

Love this!!! Love the way my hair feels after switching to homemade bar shampoo. I will never go back to store bought again!


Absolutely divine, your shampoo actually leaves my hair feeling great, the other bar shampoo's I have tried it takes weeks to get used to and leaves my hair rather oily. Love your moisturizer too, the texture and smells are wonderful


This bar smells fantastic and comes in a great size. This is my first experience with a shampoo bar so my hair still seems to be adjusting but already has more volume. The shipping was extremely fast as well! Thank you for the free charcoal 's lovely!


I just used this once last night and wow! I have very thicky shiny dark brown hair that has a natural wave. After using this shampoo, my hair was really quite curly! It completely brought out my waves to the extreme, and I love it. It rinsed to feel quite squeaky clean, but even without conditioner it didnt feel dry. The smell is quite herbal, but I love rosemary so for me thats no problem. The bar makes a great lather, and at the price is an excellent deal.




LOVE this shampoo bar. I've tried other natural ways of washing my hair but I never can get past the "greasy" hair beginning stages. With this shampoo bar, my hair acted just like I had used my favorite commercial shampoo except this way was natural! Thanks so much!

Title: Vinegar Rinse, White Hair, Natural/Handmade, Glass Bottle, 250ml
Description:
This is a vinegar rinse made from natural apple cider vinegar and a combination of herbs and essential oils to help brighten white and light blonde hair. It contains blue malva flower and lemon to cleanse your hair and remove yellow tones and restore your natural brightness. Spray in your hair after washing and distribute. 10-20 pumps are enough depending on the thickness and length of your hair. Leave in for 5 minutes and then rinse properly with warm water. You may still have a slight vinegar smell but it should disappear quickly. Vinegar detangles, increases shine, decreases build up and also adds body and definition to natural curls. It also stimulates the scalp and decreases dandruff and flaking. Please keep out of eyes! Please shake before use!
It is presented in a stylish 250ml glass jar with an aluminium lid, a plastic free alternative. You can also buy a funky soap pump separately and reuse to avoid plastic waste.

THE BENEFITS OF APPLE CIDER VINEGAR:
DETANGLES AND REDUCE FRIZZ: The outer layer of hair, the cuticle, covers the hair shaft and protects it like the bark on a tree. The cuticle is made of overlapping layers of long scales that lie along the surface of the hair. Apple cider vinegar helps smooth the cuticle which allows knots and tangles to comb out more easily. Frizzy hair is caused by lifted, open cuticles. Apple cider vinegar helps smooth and tighten cuticles to help decrease the frizz
INCREASE SHINE: When the cuticle is in a good shape, is unbroken, and lies flat , your hair has a smooth appearance. When the laters of the cuticle are tightly knit together, the light is able to reflect off the cuticle. This is what makes hair shine.
DECREASE BUILD-UP: Acv removes build up and residue from hair shaft to cleanse and clarify the hair and scalp without stripping the hairs natural oils balancing the ph on your scalp.
DEFINE NATURAL CURLS: Unlike conventional conditioners, vinegar does not weigh down the individual hair strands which can cause hair to feel heavy and look limp. Also, by taming the frizz and removing residue, the vinegar rinses help add body to all hair types and renew the bounce to naturally curly hairs.
STIMULATES HAIR GROWTH: Acv has a tonic action that promotes blood circulation in the small capillaries that irrigate the scalp with essential nutrients. This helps encourage hair growth and strengthens the roots.
DECREASES DANDRUFF AND FLAKING: Acv has natural antibacterial and anti-fungal properties that help treat a dry itchy scalp by killing the bacteria and fungus that many be associated with dandruff (and even hair loss) and other scalp conditions without harsh chemicals.

Ingredients:
Aqua, Organic Apple Cider Vinegar, Tea Made From Blue Malve Flowers, Lemon Juice, Citrus Limonum Oil (Lemon), Citrus Aurantifolia Oil (Lime), Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, Citral, (Within The Essential Oils), Optiphen (Formaldehyde And Paraben Free Preservative).

CONTAINS NO ANIMAL PRODUCTS, SUITABLE FOR VEGANS, NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS

Our products are all 100% natural and handmade in small batches. Shape, colour, scent, size and appearance can vary slightly between batches and it is in the nature of this product. As they are all natural scents they might not be as strong or develop when in use.

Title: FINN & GUNNAR NORDIC MASCULINITY NOURISHING SHAMPOO 250 ML
Description:
MASCULINITY VITAL CARE
The blend of seaweed, cloudberry, zinc, amino acids and B-vitamins vitalises the hair fibre and structure, providing volume and shine while preventing hair loss and gray hair.

SHAMPOO NOURISHING
Ideal for dry hair, and coloured, permed or bleached hair. Sulphate free. Contains ORGULEX™, cloudberry and seaweed which together with quinoa and rapeseed, olive and Crambe Abyssinica protect against free radicals and give it a natural gloss. Moisturizes and nourishes. Vegan.

Cloudberry (Rubus chamaemorus) are extremely rich in vitamins and antioxidants, including ellagic acid. Improves the moisture in the hair fibers and repairs damaged hair as well as protects the hair fibers from oxidants and UV radiation. Increases the preservation of hair colour and its intensity.

Seaweed (Fucus serratus) is packed with vitamins, proteins, amino acids, antioxidants and minerals that work wonders for your hair by keeping it hydrated and ensuring that your scalp is soothed and soft. Antioxidants provide anti-aging properties. Good source of growth-stimulating iodine, which gives you volume, thicker and fuller hair with softness and shine.

ORGULEX™ is our unique and patented formula for superior masculine hair and skin care containing zinc, amino acids and B-vitamins.
Zinc alleviates skin and scalp irritation and dandruff, delivering a fresh feeling to the skin and scalp.
The unique amino acid blend is a new technology for advanced masculine hair care. It effciently strengthens the hair fibre and structure and gives volume and shine while preventing hair loss and greying.
B-vitamins together with D-Panthenol, a provitamin of vitamin B5, hydrates the hair fiber, skin and scalp while at the same time stimulating hair growth, and reversing hair loss.

Natural perfume with uplifting scent of cinnamon and citrus.

Our products are tested on us, not on animals.

For best result, combine with our other Finn & Gunnar Nordic Masculinity products.

Our product boxes are FSC certiﬁed and use eco-friendly paper made by replacing parts of virgin tree pulp with residues of organic products such as by-products from citrus fruits, grapes, cherries, corn, olives, coffee, kiwi fruits, hazelnuts and almonds.

Labels with Ecological certification. We use mineral paper produced without trees, without water, without chlorine, without PVC and zero toxic gas emission. Bottles are made from PCR50% PET, re-using plastic that already has been produced.

Always recycle - We encourage all users of our product to dispose for correct recycling.

Tough On The Outside, Soft On The Inside.
Great hair care for men requires great skin care at the same time.

Style Your Hair With Nordic Care
Based on our legacy from four generations of hair care professionals and with more than 100 years of accumulated experience, FINN & GUNNAR a Nordic brand that is well rooted in the tradition of using organic ingredients that care for your hair effectively, gently and naturally. Our products are handmade in Norway, the recipes are of course free of toxic and harmful substances, but where we highlight the bioactive components found in herbs and plants throughout the Nordic region. By combining Nordic traditions in phytotherapy with modern science in hair care, we have developed an organic and ethical product portfolio that is adapted to the demanding needs for hair care women and men have in the Nordic countries. All our products contain clean water from Norwegian rivers and lakes. We want our customers and dealers to be sure that our products live up to strict requirements with sustainability and quality. The products are manufactured according to standards that ensure the interests of both humans and animals,

Extracting The Best Of Nordic Sea And Soil
Nature in its purest and nurturing form. Inspired by hundreds of years of phytotherapeutic tradition, people in the Nordic countries have learned to harvest and extract the best from soil and sea, with the aim of caring for their loved ones and building a healthy society, as well as ensuring a sustainable ecosystem.

Title: Natural Argan Shampoo Bar
Description:
Argan Shampoo (1) 5 oz bar

Argan oil is known for providing natural vitamin E and antioxidants while renewing your hair's cell structure, sealing in shine, and creating lush softness.


Treat your hair to a handcrafted shampoo bar that not only cleanses, but also nourishes and softens as you lather. Most commercial shampoos contain harsh synthetics that ‘cleanse’ by stripping your hair of everything, including natural oils. That not only leaves your hair dry and unmanageable, but also dull-looking. This natural shampoo bar is created with hair-loving ingredients, turning an ordinary routine into an indulgent experience, and leaving your hair nourished and naturally beautiful! It can also be used as a bath soap.


To ensure the long life of your soap, store the bar in a cool place, out of direct sunlight until you’re ready to use it. In your shower, store the bar away from the direct water stream, and out of any standing water.


To get a good lather, swipe the soap bar across your wet hair a few times and lather and scrub. Then rinse.

Ingredients: saponified distilled water, coconut oil, palm oil (organic & sustainably harvested), castor oil, avocado oil, organic jojoba oil, organic cocoa butter, organic shea butter, wheat germ oil, organic argan oil, essential oils

Title: Champú sólido Cabello seco 50g - Shampoo bar dry hair
Description:
El champú sólido natural para cabello seco Jabonalia ha sido formulado con ingredientes naturales como el Aceite de Argán y aceite de Romero que proporcionan hidratación, fortalece el cabello y tiene propiedades antibacterianas y antifúngicas. Es útil en problemas de caspa seca persistente. Ayuda a hidratar el cuero cabello. Sus ingredientes aportan múltiples beneficios y mantienen el cabello hidratado y saludable.


MODO DE USO: Humedecer el cabello y pasar la pastilla de champú de raíz hasta las puntas, cuando se consiga la cantidad de espuma deseada, masajear unos minutos el cuero cabelludo para activar la microcirculación. De esta manera, ayudaremos a que los ingredientes actuen mejor y conseguir mejor resultado. Al finalizar la aplicación, aclarar con abundante agua. Conservar la pastilla de jabón en algún lugar seco para evitar la humedad en el producto.


Ingredients: Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Zea Mays Starch, Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Parfum, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil, CI 15985

Title: ZERO WASTE | HEMP SEED OIL
Description:
HEMP OIL SHAMPOO BAR



Our range of shampoo bars makes the most of the natural ingredients to nourish and revitalize your hair.

Suitable for all hair types

Why use a shampoo bar?

It's SLS Free (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate).
Shampoo bars offer a low carbon footprint. These solid bars are more lightweight and compact than their bottled counterparts, so they require less space during transport relative to the same amount of washes with liquid shampoo.
They Last A lot Longer in some cases up to 50-75 washes for short hair.

How often should I wash my hair with a shampoo bar?

If you are ready to start using a shampoo bar for the first time, I suggest you apply this after your shampoo every 2/3 days until your hair has properly transitioned and got used to the ingredients of your new shampoo.
give it time then use as you would a normal liquid shampoo.

All our shampoo bars will leave your hair feeling clean, revitalized, and healthy, with olive oils, coconut oils, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera, And many more Healthy oils & Botanicals embedded in our shampoo bars.

WASHES UP TO 30 -50 | WEIGHT 110G | SUITABILITY FOR ALL HAIR TYPES

What's inside?
Coconut Oil
reduces inflammation, keeps skin moisturised, helping heal wounds. The medium-chain fatty acids found in coconut oil also possess antimicrobial properties that can help treat acne and protect the skin from harmful bacteria.
Hemp Seed Oil
hemp oil is a great weapon against hair loss, thinning hair, and hair regrowth. These fatty acids are needed for new hair growth. Hemp seed oil can also improve blood circulation in the scalp, thereby stimulating new hair growth.
Vitamin E Oil
 When applied topically to your hair, there are several purported benefits of using vitamin E oil: It can stimulate capillary growth in your scalp, in turn, supports hair growth; it prevents breakage and pesky split ends; its antioxidants even boost hair's elasticity and shine.
 Flaxseed Oil
 Vitamin E in flaxseed oil helps to treat hair loss and stimulate new hair growth. Lignans act as strong antioxidants that can help in the regrowth of healthier and stronger hair And nourish the scalp from within, providing relief from dandruff.

Additional Information:
All FS products are formulated to comply with the EU and UK Cosmetics Safety Regulations (EC (No) 1223/2009).

An important part of meeting the Regulations is the requirement to ensure our products are safe for the user.
Any ingredients that are listed as prohibited by law cannot be used.
In addition, it is a requirement of the legislation that all of our products have a valid Cosmetic Product Safety Report.
This is created by a highly qualified Toxicologist and Safety Assessor, who holds a Ph.D. in Toxicology and is a Member of the Royal Society of Biology, and has many years’ experience in the industry.

 

INGREDIENTS
Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Stearate, Sorbitol, Sodium Laurate, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Titanium Dioxide, Stearic Acid, Lauric Acid, Pentasodium Pentetate, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Polyquaternium-7, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Sodium Benzoate, Vitamin E (Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil), Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Fragrance Oil Lemon Lavender. No Added Coloring.
Tags: Shampoo Bar
